DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate immunogenicity serum-free pre-formulated solution Avonex give interferon beta naive patient relapsing/remitting multiple sclerosis .
DOC.criteria: Must diagnosis relapsing/remitting MS define McDonald , et al15 ; criterion number 14 . Must expand disability status scale ( EDSS ) score 0 5.5 , inclusive . Must able understand comply protocol . Has experience relapse within 2 month prior Day 1 . Relapses define new recurrent neurologic symptom associate fever infection , last least 48 hour , accompany new objective neurological finding upon examination investigator . History significant cardiac , endocrinologic , hematologic , hepatic , immunologic , metabolic , urologic , pulmonary , neurologic , dermatologic , psychiatric , renal , and/or major disease would preclude therapy interferon beta . Abnormal screen baseline blood test determine clinically significant investigator History seizure within 3 month prior Day 1 . History suicidal ideation within 3 month prior Day 1 episode severe depression within 3 month prior Day 1 . Known allergy natural rubber latex . Other inclusion exclusion criterion apply per protocol
